OrchestrationAgents.Name: ChatModeratorAgent
OrchestrationAgents.Speciality: Moderates the orchestration chat and redirect chats to other agents in the group

OrchestrationAgents.Name: ProjectInfoAgent
OrchestrationAgents.Speciality: Provides information about IoT Automated Gardening System, such as the devices and sensors use, or the cloud services used, and more. Must be specified facts. Cannot make up information.

OrchestrationAgents.Name: AdafruitFeedAgent
OrchestrationAgents.Speciality: Retrieves time-series sensor and device data requested by the user from Adafruit IO. Has the ability to analyzes, summarize, and format the data as requested by the user.

OrchestrationAgents.Name: PlantInfoAgent
OrchestrationAgents.Speciality: Summmarize and a short description of the needs and other facts about plants, including vegetables and trees. Formats and compiles all of the properties specified in the PlantInfo domain file.
